lead_paragraph: They've hired the two most coveted coaches in world football. Their spending on new players this offseason has almost reached the $400-million barrier. Their stated aim is to win the English Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola vs. Mourinho Duel Resumes in Manchester
headline.main: Guardiola vs. Mourinho Duel Resumes in Manchester
